con:configuration.content: EventId size must be between 1 and 64

con:config.con:query: SELECT * FROM audit.app_audit_log where APP_AUDIT_LOG.EVENT_ID='auditmangr' ORDER BY APP_AUDIT_LOG.LOG_DTIMES desc

con:configuration.content: EventName size must be between 1 and 128
EventType size must be between 1 and 64
HostName size must be between 1 and 32
HostIp size must be between 1 and 16
ApplicationId size must be between 1 and 64
ApplicationName size must be between 1 and 128
SessionUserId size must be between 1 and 64
SessionUserName size must be between 1 and 128
Id size must be between 1 and 64
IdType size must be between 1 and 64
CreatedBy size must be between 1 and 255
ActionTimeStamp should be in ISO 8601 format - yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.SSS
ActionTimeStamp should be in ISO 8601 format - yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.SSS

con:testCase.name: Mosip_test_SMS Notiofication_fun_Smoke_HIGH_1_trigger sms with valid Inputs
Mosip_test_SMS Notiofication_fun_Progression_Medium_1_trigger sms with invalid Phone Number

con:configuration.content: Contact number cannot contains alphabet,special character or less than or more than 10 digits

con:testCase.name: Mosip_test_SMS Notiofication_fun_Progression_Medium_1_trigger sms with empty phone Number
Mosip_test_SMS Notiofication_fun_Progression_Medium_1_trigger sms with empty message & phoneNumber
Mosip_test_SMS Notiofication_fun_Progression_Medium_1_trigger sms with phone Number less than 10

con:configuration.content: Contact number cannot contains alphabet,special character or less than or more than 10 digits

con:testCase.name: Mosip_test_SMS Notiofication_fun_Regression_Medium_1_trigger sms with phone Number more than 10

con:configuration.content: Contact number cannot contains alphabet,special character or less than or more than 10 digits

con:testCase.name: Mosip_test_Email Notiofication_fun_Smoke_HIGH_1_trigger email with mandatory fields

con:configuration.content: To must be valid. It can't be empty or null.
Subject must be valid. It can't be empty or null.
Content must be valid. It can't be empty or null.

con:testCase.name: Mosip_test_Email Notiofication_fun_Progression_Medium_1__trigger email with empty mailTo & subject

con:configuration.content: Subject must be valid. It can't be empty or null.
To must be valid. It can't be empty or null.

con:testCase.name: Mosip_test_Email Notiofication_fun_Progression_Medium_1__trigger email with empty mailTo & content

con:configuration.content: Content must be valid. It can't be empty or null.
To must be valid. It can't be empty or null.

con:testCase.name: Mosip_test_Email Notiofication_fun_Progression_Medium_1__trigger email with empty content & subject

con:configuration.content: Content must be valid. It can't be empty or null.
Subject must be valid. It can't be empty or null.
Key can't be empty, null, and length should be in the range of 3-255.

con:testCase.name: Mosip_test_OTPManager_fun_Progression_Medium_1_Verify key present in otp table after otp generation

con:config.con:query: Select kernel.otp_transaction.* From kernel.otp_transaction where OTP_TRANSACTION.ID='${#TestSuite#poskey}'

con:testCase.name: Mosip_test_OTPManager_fun_Progression_Medium_1_Verify otp against a key should be same as in db and got by user

con:testStep.name: db VALIDATION for otp same in db and got by user

con:config.con:query: Select kernel.otp_transaction.* From kernel.otp_transaction where OTP_TRANSACTION.ID='${#TestSuite#poskey}'

con:configuration.content: ${db VALIDATION for otp same in db and got by user#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/OTP_TRANSACTION.STATUS_CODE[1]}
